item.title: 5 Decades Later The Gas Station Mystery Is Solved...
item.description: After five decades, investigators have resolved a long-unsolved gas station case. This video reviews the original events, the breakthrough, and how the mystery was finally solved.

media:content.media:title: 5 Decades Later The Gas Station Mystery Is Solved...
media:content.media:description: After five decades, investigators have resolved a long-unsolved gas station case. This video reviews the original events, the breakthrough, and how the mystery was finally solved.

item.title: Tragic Accident or Something More? The Dan Davies Mystery
item.description: A factual look at the events surrounding Dan Davies, examining the circumstances of his disappearance, the investigation, and unanswered questions in the case.

media:content.media:title: Tragic Accident or Something More? The Dan Davies Mystery

item.title: Tammy Grogan disappeared mysteriously in 2006
item.description: She was on a cruise with her mother, aunt, and son, but the dream turned tragic as she was nowhere to be found just a few days in.
